summary: In this adaptation of William Shakespeare's King Lear, self-made ranch tycoon John Lear divides his holdings amongst his daughters, but finds that once they have his property, they reject him.
cast: Patrick Stewart|Marcia Gay Harden|Lauren Holly|Roy Scheider|David Alan Grier|Colm Meaney|Patrick Bergin|Matt Letscher|Liam Waite|Steven Bauer|Julie Cox|Richard Lineback|Fernando Banda|Juan Pablo Gamboa|Roger Cudney|Andrés García|Ehécatl Chávez
title: El Rey de Texas
